channel.title: Tensorflow on Zhaoyu Li
channel.description: Recent content in Tensorflow on Zhaoyu Li

item.title: Compiling Tensorflow on Mac OS
item.description: Table of Contents My Environment Configuration Install Command Line Tool 7.3 Clone the TensorFlow repository Install Bazel Install Python dependencies Install Tensorflow for GPU prerequisites Configure the installation Build the pip package Generate wheel file and install it In the release note of tensorflow v1.1.0, there is a section about Mac GPU support: TensorFlow 1.1.0 will be the last time we release a binary with Mac GPU support.

item.title: TensorFlow Installation
item.description: Table of Contents Install CUDA Toolkit 7.5 Installation Instructions: Install cuDNN Install pip and Virtualenv: Test the Installation We are going to install TensorFlow on Ubuntu 14.04 x64. Install CUDA Toolkit 7.5 Download CUDA Toolkit 7.5 from the following address: https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda-75-downloads-archive. If your Ubuntu is 64 bit, choose target installer for Linux Ubuntu 14.04 x86_64, which is named cuda-repo-ubuntu1404-7-5-local_7.5-18_amd64.deb. Installation Instructions: After you downloading the installation file, do the following command:
